mapper.select: select * from( select * from( select infonum, infotitle, infocontent,to_char(infowritedate,'YY-MM-DD') as infowritedate, infohit, infotype, infoattach from notice where infotype = 1 order by infonum desc) where rownum<=${pageNum}*${onePageRecord} order by infonum) where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by infonum desc

select * from (select infonum, infotitle, infocontent,to_char(infowritedate,'YY-MM-DD') as infowritedate, infohit, infotype, infoattach, lag(infonum, 1, 0) over (order by infonum desc) as prevNo, lag(infotitle, 1, '이전글이 없습니다.') over (order by infonum desc) as prevSubject, lead(infonum, 1, 0) over (order by infonum desc) as nextNo, lead(infotitle, 1, '다음글이 없습니다.') over (order by infonum desc) as nextSubject from notice where infotype = 1) where infonum=#{param1} and infotype = 1
mapper.update: update notice set infohit=infohit+1 where infonum=#{param1}
mapper.select: select count(infonum) from notice where infotype=1
